oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Bessie Smith to Hatch (copy)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Smith, Bessie, 1894-1937;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of Bessie Smith's letter to Hatch asking the shop if the enclosed picture would be better for a three sheet poster than the one previously sent.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:medium: black-and-white photographs; letters (correspondence); paperwork (records); photographs; sales records;
